document.title: Hot Topic: Changes to the State and Local Sales and Use Tax Return: Effective July 15, 2002
document.abstract: Because the sales tax rate increase became effective July 15, 2002, reporting sales may be complicated due to the fact that a municipality may have taxable sales from July 1-14 at the old state rate of 6% and sales from July 15-31 at the new state rate of 7%.
